query:
ALTER TABLE candidatePreferences 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emailNotificationsEnabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inAppNotificationsEnabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS profileVisibility ENUM('public', 'private', 'employers_only') DEFAULT 'employers_only',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS allowDataSharing BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE;
